item.title: Flatbreads
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> I made chapati the other day. Based on a couple of recipe requests and the fact that this blog has been dormant for a while, I thought I'd post the recipe here.  To start -- Chapati is an Indian flatbread. I guess what I made is technically Pulka but it's really easy to make and quite tasty. Ingredients: 2 cups whole wheat flour1 cup water1 tsp saltMix all the ingredients together to form a dough.
